name: U.C.P: -Ultimate Cold Pill
description:
You are the miracle cure. A super pill. More advanced than any other drug on the market. You will irradiate all viruses.

It's a twin stick shooter without the twin.

Designed to be used with the xbox controler

Left Stick to move and Right Bumper to fire.

Avoid raising the BPM over 200.

Designed by Kevin Coppock.

Audio by Ayden Snell
